amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section at the end of the bill to require offsets.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section at the end of the bill to require offsets.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 256 (Roll no. 128).
